full_summary:
**RISO Boiler Maintenance for Debert Area**
### Tender Announcement

Reference: WS3732765433 - Doc3801064634

Canada is seeking offers from experienced contractors to provide boiler maintenance services for the Department of National Defence at the Debert area of CFB Halifax. The successful contractor will be responsible for furnishing all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, and supervision to inspect, maintain, and conduct emergency repairs to commercial and domestic boilers/furnaces and their associated distribution systems.

### Opportunity Details

* `UNSPSC Codes`: 72151001 (Boiler maintenance service) and 72151003 (Heating system maintenance and repair service)
* `Procurement Category`: Service (SRV)
* `Procurement Method`: Competitive Open Bidding
* `Trade Agreements`: Offers from contractors who are Canadian-based or from countries participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other trade agreements listed below are welcome.
  - Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  - North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada-Japan Free Trade Agreement
